text: César Ferreras (born 6 May 1934) is a Venezuelan wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle light heavyweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Venezuelan male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Venezuela Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Bolívar (state) Category:Pan American Games medalists in wrestling Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Venezuela Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Venezuela Category:Wrestlers at the 1959 Pan American Games Category:Wrestlers at the 1963 Pan American Games
title: César Ferreras
